museumapi module

class src.museum_api.museumapi.MuseumAPI

Bases: object

MuseumAPI class allows you to easily get the objects from museum API through objects without knowing much details of the endpoints.

get_all_object_ids(headers=None)

fetches all the object ids from the museum api.

Parameters

headers – headers to be sent in request

Returns

a dictionary with following keys -:

  • total: int

    count of number of objects fetched from museum api

  • objectIds: list

    list of all the object ids fetched from in museum

get_object_for_id(object_id, headers=None)

fetches an object with specified object_id from museum api.

Parameters

  • object_id – object_id of the object to fetch data from museum api

  • headers – headers to be sent in request

Returns

dictionary containing detail of the object.
